title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 442.24 - Respite care and services in group residences
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 442.24 - Respite care and services in group residences

State Regulations

Institutions as defined in section
441.2
(f) of this

Title and group residences as defined in section
441.2
(g) of this

Title may be approved by social services districts as approved respite care and
services providers pursuant Part 435 of this Title; provided, however, that
public institutions caring for more than 25 children cannot be approved to
provide respite care and services for foster families. Such providers are
subject to all applicable requirements of such Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
442.24

Amended

New

York State Register December 23, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 51, eff. 12/23/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
